Strings of Stillness - Where movement meets music, and light meets silence
Across the Seas - Carnatic Violin and Minimalist Piano
Ebony and Ivory
description: Having first sung together when they were merely 3 years old, Aleyna and Diya have been singing side by side for over two decades. Now at 25, the bond of these two contrasting personalities shine brighter than ever on stage. Aleyna, who currently performs on the prestigious West End in London, brings her powerhouse vocals and theatrical flair, while Diya, an ATCL in Piano Performance and ARSM in Singing, adds her artistry and attention to detail. Together, their voices and stories intertwine in perfect harmony—like Ebony and Ivory. This one-of-a-kind evening will take audiences on a journey across genres and generations. From the drama of Wickedand the joy of Mamma Mia, to the nostalgia of High School Musical, and the timeless beauty of operatic gems like Lakmé and Die Fledermaus, Aleyna and Diya promise a performance as versatile as it is heartfelt. Adding to the magic are iconic hits by Alicia Keys, Paul McCartney & Stevie Wonder, Michael Jackson, and Jerry Lee Lewis—ensuring an evening that blends the worlds of musical theatre, classical music, and pop with seamless charm. Ebony and Ivory is more than a concert—it’s a celebration of friendship, passion, and the power of music to unite across time and style. Ticketing: whatsapp 9164368271- names will be entered into an excel sheet and people will be given a serial number, following payment through UPI. The serial number can be given at the entrance on the day of the show and the name will be checked off the list.
